00031 #ifndef ERR_H
00032 #define ERR_H
00033 
00034 #include <assert.h>
00035 #include <iostream>
00036 #include <string>
00037 #include <vector>
00038 #include <new>
00039 #include "stdlib.h"
00040 #include "Except.h"
00041 #include "Verbose.h"
00042 #include "ErrHandler.h"
00043 #include "VerboseErrHandler.h"
00048 class Err {
00049 
00050  public: 
00052   class Param {
00053     public:
00055     Param() {
00056       VerboseErrHandler *handler = new VerboseErrHandler(false);
00057       m_ErrHandlers.push_back(handler);
00058       m_Throw = false;
00059     }
00060     
00062     ~Param() { 
00063       for(unsigned int i = 0; i < m_ErrHandlers.size(); i++) {
00064         delete m_ErrHandlers[i];
00065       }
00066     }
00067 
00068     std::vector<ErrHandler *> m_ErrHandlers; 
00069     bool m_Throw; 
00070   };
00071     
00077   static Param &getParam() {
00078     static Param m_Param;
00079     return m_Param;
00080   }
00081 
00086   static void errAbort(const std::string &msg, const std::string prefix = "\nFATAL ERROR: "){ // throw (Except) {
00087     unsigned int size = getParam().m_ErrHandlers.size();
00088     assert(size > 0);
00089     getParam().m_ErrHandlers[size - 1]->handleError(prefix + msg);
00090   }
00091 
00096   static void pushHandler(ErrHandler *handler) {
00097     getParam().m_ErrHandlers.push_back(handler);
00098   }
00099 
00104   static ErrHandler *popHandler() {
00105     unsigned int count = getParam().m_ErrHandlers.size();
00106     if(count < 1) {
00107       Err::errAbort("Err::popHandler() - can't pop error handler when there aren't any left.");
00108     }
00109     ErrHandler *handler = getParam().m_ErrHandlers[count - 1];
00110     getParam().m_ErrHandlers.pop_back();
00111     return handler;
00112   }
00113 
00123   inline static void check(bool passed, const char *msg) {
00124     if(!passed) {
00125       errAbort(msg);
00126     }
00127   }
00128 
00135   inline static void check(bool passed, const std::string &msg) {
00136     if(!passed) {
00137       errAbort(msg);
00138     }
00139   }
00140 
00146   static void setThrowStatus(bool doThrow) {
00147     VerboseErrHandler *handler = new VerboseErrHandler(doThrow);
00148     pushHandler(handler);
00149   }
00150 
00151 };

00153 #endif /* ERR_H */
